intro.Text: Hello, traveler! What brings you to these parts?

1.Text: Bought a house here. I am Simel

response1.Text: Nice to have a new friendly face around here!

intro.Text: Greetings, welcome to my humble shop. Sadly, we are closed today.

response3.Text: Thanks! Come tommorow to check our wares...

intro.Text: You wake up at the end of the day. What will happen tonight?

killerInHouse.Text: You wake up to the sound of footsteps. There's a killer in the house!

peacefulSleep.Text: You sleep peacefully through the night.

payOrDie.Text: A menacing voice demands that you pay up or face the consequences!

killerResolved.Text: You overpowered the killer and became victorious. He did not expect you to resist.
